Uses of Class
com.experian.aperture.datastudio.sdk.testframework.SDKAssertion

  • Packages that use SDKAssertion 
    Package Description
    com.experian.aperture.datastudio.sdk.testframework
    Common package of Aperture data SDK test framework.

    • Uses of SDKAssertion in com.experian.aperture.datastudio.sdk.testframework

      Methods in com.experian.aperture.datastudio.sdk.testframework that return SDKAssertion 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SDKAssertion SDKAssertion.assertArgumentValue(int argumentIndex, String expectedValue)
      Assert the argument value retrieved based on the supplied argument index with the given expectedValue.
      SDKAssertion SDKAssertion.assertCacheIsValid(String cacheName)
      Assert that the cache is still valid by calling Cache.isValid() method.
      SDKAssertion SDKAssertion.assertCacheValue(String cacheName, String cacheKey, String expectedCacheValue)
      Assert expectedCacheValue against actual cache value derived from the cacheKey and cacheName.
      SDKAssertion SDKAssertion.assertColumnName(int columnIndex, String expectedColumnName)
      Compare the expected column name against the actual column name based on the column index.
      SDKAssertion SDKAssertion.assertColumnSize(int expectedColumnSize)
      Compare the expectedColumnSize with the StepOutput's column size.
      SDKAssertion SDKAssertion.assertExecutedRowCount(long expectedRowCount)
      Assert the expectedRowCount against the row that is processed by StepOutput.execute method.
      SDKAssertion SDKAssertion.assertServerProperty(String serverPropertyKey, Object expectedServerPropertyValue)
      Assert a value returned based on serverPropertyKey against expectedServerPropertyValue.
      SDKAssertion SDKAssertion.assertThatAllRowsIsExecuted()
      assert that all rows from the input is executed based on the number of input rows compared against the row(s) that are processed by StepOutput.execute.
      SDKAssertion SDKAssertion.closeCustomStep()
      Close custom step.
      SDKAssertion TestSession.execute()
      Executes the custom step.
      SDKAssertion SDKAsyncAssertion.waitForAssertion()
      Wait for all of the SDKAsyncAssertion.assertColumnValueAt call to complete.
